data.strFullDescription:
[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/2c4fccecf59c9d221be61af18667921d.avif?t=1750949552[/img]

R.E.P.O. is an online co-op horror game featuring physics, proximity voice chat and scary monsters. You and up to 5 friends can venture into terrifying environments to extract valuable objects using your physics-based grabbing tool.[/p]

[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/43e05589cbe2c26d405c45284f0bad12.webp?t=1750949552[/img][/p]
[p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/71dacc434b4c5cb932f13a0951a9580d.poster.avif?t=1750949552" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/71dacc434b4c5cb932f13a0951a9580d.webm?t=1750949552"][/imgvid][/p]
[p][b][i]Even the monsters are affected by Newton's law of gravity![/i][/b]
Under the employ of a mysterious computer intelligence. It is your job to locate, transport and extract valuable items from the haunted remains of a long lost humanity.[/p]

[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/6ed4178b578038000dd892e5aa440ae6.webp?t=1750949552[/img][/p]
[p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/7083b094e5b6d61085f9d38a174b501d.poster.avif?t=1750949552" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/7083b094e5b6d61085f9d38a174b501d.webm?t=1750949552"][/imgvid][/p]
[p][b][i]...but know when to stay quiet.[/i][/b]
Transport anything from heavy pianos to fragile ceramics and use teamwork to make sure that the precious cargo will safely reach its destination.[/p]

[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/2797aacb46e3ed42749d3091c8562377.webp?t=1750949552[/img][/p]
[p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/4b0af4e5b6e42fc59c00a46dd0a7c7e2.poster.avif?t=1750949552" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/4b0af4e5b6e42fc59c00a46dd0a7c7e2.webm?t=1750949552"][/imgvid][/p]
[p][b][i]Robotic enhancements  increase your chances![/i][/b]
Use your hard earned [strike]cash[/strike] [b]\[SURPLUS][/b] to purchase upgrades and weapons from your [strike]heartless[/strike] [b]\[GENEROUS][/b] creator.[/p]

[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3241660/extras/8cfab6d1168ff69eaa4ac03301ee9ce8.avif?t=1750949552[/img][/p]
data.strSnippet: An online co-op horror game with up to 6 players. Locate valuable, fully physics-based objects and handle them with care as you retrieve and extract to satisfy your creator's desires.
